1_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k.body: Btw, I'm just waiting for Tor 0.2.8 to reach the repos, at which point I will simplify the package to require less manual work (see details here: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/zeronet-git/). But, I hesitate to fully automate the permission modifications in the PKGBUILD, because this doesn't feel right from the security perspective.
